articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens
3 Ways to build a decentralized database ⚡️
You can easily build a scalable, fast, decentralized, permanent, and immutable data store / database, using @ArweaveEco + @BundlrNetwork 🐘
It's fast, cheap (free for <100KB), holds arbitrary amounts of state https://docs.weavedb.dev/docs/intro https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1625228674180980763

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT pbillingsby
There's many ways to interact with the Arweave network. One of the basic ways is using the HTTP API.
Retrieving data from the network can usually be achieved in one line of code using tools like Axios/Fetch for JS, Guzzle for PHP.
Here are some common endpoint interactions👇

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Our first Wellness Session of Season 2 begins in 𝟭 𝗵𝗼𝘂𝗿, in Discord. Hope to see you there 🍵


community @ dd: 𝗪𝗘𝗟𝗟𝗡𝗘𝗦𝗦 𝗛𝗨𝗕 🍵
Every 2 weeks, beginning 𝟭𝟯𝘁𝗵 𝗙𝗲𝗯𝗿𝘂𝗮𝗿𝘆 — the Wellness Team will host a 60min support/guidance session in Discord: covering topics such as burnout, imposter syndrome, work-life balance, and more.
Feel free to stop by 💚
articles.title: Our first Wellness Session of Season 2 begins in 𝟭 𝗵𝗼𝘂𝗿, in Discord. Hope to see you there 🍵
